text:
[Verse]
Wake up to see the sky so blue
What a day no clouds in view
Chasing dreams we thought we knew
Golden sun we'll make it true

[Verse 2]
City streets they call our name
Every morning feels the same
In the glow of summer's flame
Life's a song that's never tame

[Chorus]
Golden dreams we fly so high
Touch the stars up in the sky
Never gonna say goodbye
Golden dreams can't let them die

[Verse 3]
Dancing through the crowded night
Neon lights they shine so bright
Holding on with all our might
In this world we feel so light

[Verse 4]
Time it moves we'll never stop
Climbing up until we drop
Reaching for that highest top
Living life it feels nonstop

[Chorus]
Golden dreams we fly so high
Touch the stars up in the sky
Never gonna say goodbye
Golden dreams can't let them die
title: Golden Dreams
